content:
Hi all, wanted to post notice that we plan to perform 'official' work on the next Subscriptions call (May 5). We will be working through Jira tickets based on this filter, which should contain non-applied tickets from the backport ballot.

I will continue working on proposed dispositions until the meeting in order to make the best use of time. If anyone has a ticket they want promoted or removed, please let me know. Additionally, if there are any questions or comments, please let me know.

Thanks!
